name: Herbed Grilled Chicken

instructions.title: Marinate Chicken
instructions.description: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, salt, and pepper. Coat chicken breasts with the mixture and let marinate for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Preheat Grill
instructions.description: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.

instructions.title: Grill Chicken
instructions.description: Place chicken on the grill and cook for 6-7 minutes on each side until fully cooked.

description: Juicy chicken breasts marinated with herbs and grilled to perfection.

name: Beef Stir Fry

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice beef, bell pepper, and carrot. Chop ginger finely.

instructions.title: Cook Beef
instructions.description: Heat sesame oil in a pan, add beef strips, and cook until brown.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add ginger, bell pepper, broccoli, and carrot. Stir fry for 5 minutes.

instructions.title: Add Sauce
instructions.description: Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.

description: A quick and flavorful beef stir fry with fresh vegetables.

name: Honey Garlic Pork Chops

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

instructions.title: Marinate Pork Chops
instructions.description: Coat pork chops with marinade and let sit for 20 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Pork Chops
instructions.description: Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side until golden brown.

description: Tender pork chops glazed with a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce.

name: Lemon Herb Lamb Chops

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Combine olive oil, lemon zest, minced garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

instructions.title: Marinate Lamb Chops
instructions.description: Rub the mixture over lamb chops and marinate for 20 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Lamb Chops
instructions.description: Heat a pan over medium-high heat and cook lamb chops for 3-4 minutes on each side to desired doneness.

description: Delicious lamb chops infused with a lemon and herb marinade.

name: Vegetarian Stuffed Bell Peppers

instructions.title: Prepare the Quinoa
instructions.description: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions in salted water.

instructions.title: Preheat Oven
instructions.description: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).

instructions.title: Prepare the Peppers
instructions.description: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove the seeds.

instructions.title: Mix Filling
instructions.description: In a bowl, combine cooked quinoa, black beans, corn, cumin, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Stuff Peppers
instructions.description: Fill each bell pepper with the quinoa mixture and top with cheddar cheese.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, and bake for 30 minutes.

description: Colorful bell peppers filled with a savory quinoa and black bean mix, topped with melted cheddar.

name: Caprese Salad

instructions.title: Slice Ingredients
instructions.description: Thinly slice the tomatoes and mozzarella.

instructions.title: Assemble Salad
instructions.description: Layer tomato slices, mozzarella slices, and basil leaves on a platter.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

instructions.title: Final Touches
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

description: A refreshing Italian salad featuring ripe tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and fresh basil.

name: Thai Coconut Fish Curry

instructions.title: Cook Curry Paste
instructions.description: Fry the red curry paste in a pan until fragrant.

instructions.title: Simmer Fish
instructions.description: Add coconut milk and fish sauce, bring to a simmer, and add fish fillets.

instructions.title: Finish with Vegetables
instructions.description: Add sliced red bell pepper and basil leaves, then squeeze lime juice over the curry before serving.

description: Rich and flavorful fish curry made with creamy coconut milk and aromatic Thai spices.

name: Vegetarian Fried Rice

instructions.title: Prep Veggies
instructions.description: Chop carrots and green onions finely. Mince garlic.

instructions.title: Cook Eggs
instructions.description: Scramble the eggs in a pan and set aside.

instructions.title: Stir-fry Vegetables
instructions.description: In sesame oil, sauté garlic, carrots, and peas until tender.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Add cooked rice, soy sauce, scrambled eggs, and green onions to the pan.

instructions.title: Finish
instructions.description: Stir everything together and cook for another 2 minutes.

description: A quick and easy vegetarian fried rice, perfect for a midweek dinner.

name: Vegetarian Tacos

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice avocado, chop cherry tomatoes, and thinly slice red onion.

instructions.title: Make Filling
instructions.description: In a bowl, mix black beans, avocado, tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and chili powder.

instructions.title: Warm Tortillas
instructions.description: Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet for about 30 seconds on each side.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Spoon the filling onto each tortilla and fold in half.

description: A vibrant and zesty vegetarian taco filled with black beans and fresh avocado.

name: Vegan Chickpea Salad

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Chop cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion into small pieces.

instructions.title: Mix Ingredients
instructions.description: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, chopped vegetables, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

description: A refreshing and protein-rich salad perfect for a light meal.

name: Vegan Thai Green Curry

instructions.title: Cook Tofu
instructions.description: Cut tofu into cubes and fry until golden.

instructions.title: Make Curry Base
instructions.description: Heat a pan and add green curry paste, cook for a minute, then add coconut milk.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add green beans, bell pepper, and zucchini, and simmer until tender.

instructions.title: Finish and Serve
instructions.description: Stir in tofu and basil, add soy sauce, and squeeze lime juice before serving.

description: A fragrant and colorful curry that is both satisfying and delicious.

name: Vegan Mexican Tacos

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Mash avocado and mix with diced tomato, onion, lime juice, salt, and cilantro.

instructions.title: Cook Beans
instructions.description: Heat black beans in a pan with chili powder and a pinch of salt.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Fill tortillas with black beans and avocado mixture.

description: Flavorful and vibrant tacos that are perfect for a quick vegan meal.

name: Vegan Indian Lentil Soup

instructions.title: Sauté Aromatics
instructions.description: In a pot, sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger with cumin seeds.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add diced carrot and celery, cook for a few minutes.

instructions.title: Simmer Soup
instructions.description: Add lentils, turmeric, vegetable broth, and salt, simmer until lentils are tender.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves before serving.

description: A warming and nutritious soup with a hint of spice and aromatic flavors.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta

instructions.title: Boil Pasta
instructions.description: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.

instructions.title: Prepare Shrimp
instructions.description: In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic, then add shrimp and cook until pink.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Toss cooked pasta with shrimp, lemon juice, and parsley. Top with parmesan cheese before serving.

description: A quick and delicious pasta dish with succulent shrimp and a hint of garlic.

name: Spanish Garlic Prawns

instructions.title: Sauté Garlic
instructions.description: Heat olive oil in a pan, add sliced garlic, and cook until golden.

instructions.title: Cook Prawns
instructions.description: Add prawns, paprika, and chili flakes, and cook until prawns are pink.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Finish with chopped parsley and a squeeze of lemon before serving.

description: A classic Spanish tapas dish featuring prawns cooked in garlic and olive oil.

name: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, dill, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Marinate Salmon
instructions.description: Coat salmon fillets with marinade and let sit for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Grill Salmon
instructions.description: Grill salmon fillets on a preheated grill for 5-7 minutes on each side.

description: Juicy grilled salmon with a fresh and zesty lemon herb marinade.

name: Spicy Korean Beef Stir-Fry

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice beef into thin strips, chop garlic, and slice green onions.

instructions.title: Make the Sauce
instructions.description: Mix gochujang paste, soy sauce, garlic, and sesame oil in a bowl.

instructions.title: Cook the Beef
instructions.description: Stir-fry beef strips in a hot pan until browned.

instructions.title: Combine and Serve
instructions.description: Add sauce and vegetables to the pan, cook for 5 mins, garnish with sesame seeds, and serve.

description: A fiery and savory Korean beef stir-fry that's perfect for spice lovers.

name: Moroccan Lamb Tagine

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice lamb and onion, chop garlic and apricots.

instructions.title: Brown the Lamb
instructions.description: Sauté lamb in a tagine or pot until browned on all sides.

instructions.title: Add Aromatics
instructions.description: Add onion, garlic, and spices, and cook until fragrant.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Add apricots, chickpeas, and tomato purée, cover, and cook for 1 hour.

description: A fragrant and hearty lamb tagine, rich in spices and sweetness from apricots.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches

instructions.title: Cook Pork
instructions.description: Slow cook pork shoulder with BBQ sauce until tender, then shred with forks.

instructions.title: Prepare Sandwiches
instructions.description: Serve pulled pork on buns with coleslaw and extra BBQ sauce.

description: Savor the taste of smoky BBQ flavors in these easy pulled pork sandwiches, perfect for a casual and tasty meal.

name: Italian Chicken Cacciatore

instructions.title: Brown the Chicken
instructions.description: Sauté chicken in olive oil until golden brown, then remove from pan.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: Add onions, bell peppers, and mushrooms to the pan and cook until soft.

instructions.title: Deglaze
instructions.description: Pour in red wine, scraping up any bits from the pan.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Return chicken to the pan, add tomatoes and rosemary, and simmer until chicken is cooked through.

description: A rustic Italian chicken stew that's rich in flavor and perfect for a cozy meal.

name: Mexican Pork Carnitas

instructions.title: Prepare Pork
instructions.description: Cut the pork into large chunks and season with salt and cumin.

instructions.title: Cook Pork
instructions.description: In a large pot, add pork, orange juice, onion, garlic, and bay leaves, and bring to a boil.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Reduce heat to low and simmer until meat is tender, about 1.5 hours.

instructions.title: Crisp the Meat
instructions.description: Shred pork and crisp in a hot pan, then garnish with coriander before serving.

description: Tender and flavorful pork carnitas with a citrusy twist, perfect for tacos.

name: Thai Green Curry

instructions.title: Prepare Tofu
instructions.description: Cut tofu into cubes and fry until golden.

instructions.title: Cook Paste
instructions.description: In a saucepan, heat olive oil, add green curry paste, and cook for 2 minutes.

instructions.title: Add Coconut Milk
instructions.description: Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add eggplant, bell pepper, and bamboo shoots; simmer until tender.

instructions.title: Finish with Tofu & Seasoning
instructions.description: Add fried tofu, soy sauce, and lime juice, simmer for another 5 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with Thai basil and serve hot.

description: A flavorful vegan curry with aromatic spices and creamy coconut milk.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers

instructions.title: Prepare the Quinoa
instructions.description: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and set aside.

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion and garlic until golden. Add black beans, corn, cooked quinoa, cumin, salt, and pepper, and stir to combine.

instructions.title: Stuff the Peppers
instructions.description: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds. Fill each pepper with the quinoa mixture and top with grated cheddar cheese.

instructions.title: Bake the Peppers
instructions.description: Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30 minutes until the peppers are tender and cheese is melted.

description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a flavorful mixture of quinoa, beans, and cheese.

name: Spinach and Ricotta Cannelloni

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: In a pan, wilt spinach in olive oil, then mix with ricotta, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Stuff the Cannelloni
instructions.description: Fill each cannelloni tube with the spinach and ricotta mixture.

instructions.title: Assemble the Dish
instructions.description: Spread a layer of tomato sauce in a baking dish, arrange stuffed cannelloni on top, and cover with remaining sauce.

instructions.title: Bake the Cannelloni
instructions.description: Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 40 minutes until the top is golden.

description: Delicious baked cannelloni filled with creamy ricotta and fresh spinach.

name: Vegan Chocolate Avocado Mousse

instructions.title: Blend Ingredients
instructions.description: Scoop out avocado flesh and blend with cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla, and salt until smooth.

instructions.title: Chill
instructions.description: Transfer the mousse to serving cups and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

description: An indulgent and creamy chocolate mousse made with avocado for a healthy twist on a classic dessert.

name: Chickpea and Vegetable Tagine

instructions.title: Sauté Aromatics
instructions.description: In a tagine or pot, heat olive oil and sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables and Spices
instructions.description: Add carrots, zucchini, cumin, and cinnamon stick, and cook until vegetables begin to soften.

instructions.title: Simmer with Chickpeas
instructions.description: Add chickpeas and canned tomatoes, bring to a simmer, and cook for 30 minutes until flavors meld.

instructions.title: Adjust Seasoning
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

description: A hearty Moroccan tagine packed with chickpeas and vibrant vegetables.

name: Mushroom and Leek Risotto

instructions.title: Prepare the Vegetables
instructions.description: Clean and slice the mushrooms and leek.

instructions.title: Start the Risotto
instructions.description: In a pot, heat olive oil and butter, sauté leek and mushrooms until soft.

instructions.title: Cook the Rice
instructions.description: Add rice and cook until translucent, then pour in white wine, stirring until absorbed.

instructions.title: Add Stock Gradually
instructions.description: Add hot vegetable stock a ladle at a time, stirring continuously until rice is creamy and cooked.

instructions.title: Finish with Cheese
instructions.description: Stir in parmesan cheese, season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

description: Rich and creamy risotto with earthy mushrooms and delicate leeks.

name: Mushroom Stroganoff

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop the mushrooms, onion, and garlic finely.

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: Heat olive oil in a pan, add onions and garlic, and sauté until golden.

instructions.title: Cook Mushrooms
instructions.description: Add mushrooms and cook until they release moisture.

instructions.title: Add Broth
instructions.description: Pour in vegetable broth, add paprika, and simmer for 10 minutes.

instructions.title: Finish with Cream
instructions.description: Stir in the vegan sour cream, season with salt and pepper, and simmer another 5 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

description: A creamy, hearty vegan twist on the classic stroganoff.

name: Moroccan Vegetable Tagine

instructions.title: Chop Vegetables
instructions.description: Cut carrots, zucchini, and tomatoes into chunks.

instructions.title: Sauté Onion and Garlic
instructions.description: In a tagine or large pot, heat olive oil and sauté onions and garlic until soft.

instructions.title: Add Spices
instructions.description: Stir in ras el hanout and cook for 1 minute.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Add carrots, zucchini, tomatoes, and chickpeas; stir well.

instructions.title: Simmer with Broth
instructions.description: Pour in vegetable broth, cover, and simmer for 40 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve hot.

description: A fragrant Moroccan dish packed with vegetables and exotic spices.

name: Vegan Paella

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop bell pepper and garlic finely.

instructions.title: Sauté Garlic and Pepper
instructions.description: In a paella pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic and red bell pepper until soft.

instructions.title: Add Rice and Spices
instructions.description: Add rice, saffron, and smoked paprika, stir well to coat the rice.

instructions.title: Add Broth and Simmer
instructions.description: Pour in vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add green peas and artichoke hearts, cook until rice is tender.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with lemon wedges and serve hot.

description: A vibrant and colorful vegan paella bursting with flavors.

name: Seafood Paella

instructions.title: Prepare the Saffron
instructions.description: Steep saffron in a small bowl with 2 tablespoons of warm water.

instructions.title: Cook Aromatics
instructions.description: In a large skillet, heat olive oil and sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes and Rice
instructions.description: Stir in tomatoes and rice, cook for 2 minutes.

instructions.title: Add Stock and Saffron
instructions.description: Pour in fish stock and saffron water, bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Add Seafood
instructions.description: Add shrimp, mussels, and squid evenly over the rice, cook for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Finish Cooking
instructions.description: Stir in peas and cook until seafood is done. Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.

description: A classic Spanish dish bursting with the flavors of the sea.

name: Grilled Miso Salmon

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix miso paste, soy sauce, mirin, sesame oil, ginger, and garlic in a bowl.

instructions.title: Marinate Salmon
instructions.description: Place salmon fillets in marinade and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Preheat Grill
instructions.description: Heat grill to medium-high heat.

instructions.title: Grill Salmon
instructions.description: Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes each side until cooked through.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds before serving.

description: A savory and sweet miso-marinated salmon grilled to perfection.

name: Thai Green Curry with Prawns

instructions.title: Cook Curry Paste
instructions.description: Heat a pot over medium heat and cook the green curry paste until fragrant.

instructions.title: Add Coconut Milk
instructions.description: Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Season the Curry
instructions.description: Add fish sauce, brown sugar, and lime leaves.

instructions.title: Cook Prawns and Vegetables
instructions.description: Add prawns and bamboo shoots; cook until prawns are pink and cooked through.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Stir in Thai basil and garnish with red chili slices.

description: A fragrant and spicy Thai curry with succulent prawns.

name: New England Clam Chowder

instructions.title: Cook Bacon
instructions.description: In a pot, cook bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In the bacon fat, sauté onion and celery until soft.

instructions.title: Make Roux
instructions.description: Add butter and flour, stir to make a roux.

instructions.title: Add Liquids
instructions.description: Slowly stir in milk, cream, and clam juice; bring to a boil.

instructions.title: Finish Soup
instructions.description: Add potatoes, thyme, and clams; simmer until potatoes are tender.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with cooked bacon and serve hot.

description: A hearty and creamy chowder filled with tender clams and crispy bacon.

name: Beef Wellington

instructions.title: Prepare the beef
instructions.description: Season the beef with salt and pepper, then sear it on all sides.

instructions.title: Prepare mushroom duxelles
instructions.description: Finely chop mushrooms and cook them until all moisture is evaporated.

instructions.title: Assemble Wellington
instructions.description: Wrap the beef in prosciutto and mushroom duxelles, then encase in puff pastry.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Brush with egg yolk and bake in the oven until golden brown.

description: A classic and elegant dish featuring tender beef wrapped in flaky pastry.

name: Coq au Vin

instructions.title: Marinate the chicken
instructions.description: Marinate chicken pieces in red wine with garlic and herbs.

instructions.title: Cook bacon and vegetables
instructions.description: Fry bacon, then add pearl onions and mushrooms until golden.

instructions.title: Cook chicken
instructions.description: Brown chicken pieces, then simmer with marinade and vegetables.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Let it stew until chicken is tender, then serve hot.

description: A rich and hearty French stew made with chicken and red wine.

name: Eggplant Moussaka

instructions.title: Prepare the Vegetables
instructions.description: Slice eggplants and potatoes, and fry or grill until golden.

instructions.title: Cook the Tomato Sauce
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic, add tomato sauce, and season with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Assemble the Moussaka
instructions.description: Layer potatoes, eggplants, and tomato sauce in a baking dish, and top with bechamel sauce.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 60 minutes until the top is golden brown.

description: A traditional Greek casserole with layers of eggplant, potatoes, and creamy bechamel.

name: Osso Buco

instructions.title: Prepare the vegetables
instructions.description: Chop carrots, celery, and onion finely.

instructions.title: Brown the veal
instructions.description: Season shanks and brown them in a pan.

instructions.title: Build the sauce
instructions.description: Add vegetables, tomato paste, wine, and stock; simmer.

instructions.title: Slow cook
instructions.description: Cook until veal is tender, about 2 hours, then garnish.

description: A sumptuous Italian dish featuring slowly braised veal shanks.

name: Rogan Josh

instructions.title: Marinate lamb
instructions.description: Mix lamb with yogurt and spices; let it marinate.

instructions.title: Prepare base
instructions.description: Fry onions, garlic, and ginger until golden brown.

instructions.title: Cook lamb
instructions.description: Add lamb to the base and cook until tender.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Simmer with water until thick and aromatic.

description: A flavorful and aromatic curry made with tender lamb and rich spices.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa and Cheese

instructions.title: Prepare the Bell Peppers
instructions.description: Slice the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds.

instructions.title: Cook the Quinoa
instructions.description: Rinse quinoa and cook it in salted water until fluffy.

instructions.title: Make the Filling
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil, then add quinoa, tomato paste, cumin, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Stuff and Bake
instructions.description: Fill bell peppers with the mixture, top with cheese, and bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 30 minutes.

description: A hearty dish of bell peppers stuffed with a savory mixture of quinoa and melted cheese.

name: Simple Chicken Tacos

instructions.title: Prepare Chicken
instructions.description: Season chicken with taco seasoning and grill until cooked through.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Fill taco shells with chicken, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

description: Enjoy a quick and easy meal with these delicious chicken tacos, perfect for a casual dinner or a fun gathering.

name: Vegetable Lasagna with Homemade Pasta

instructions.title: Make the Pasta
instructions.description: Combine flour and eggs to create a dough, roll it out thinly, and cut into sheets.

instructions.title: Prepare the Vegetables
instructions.description: Slice zucchini and wilt spinach in a pan with olive oil.

instructions.title: Assemble the Lasagna
instructions.description: Layer pasta sheets, vegetables, ricotta, tomato sauce, and parmesan in a baking dish.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 45 minutes until golden and bubbling.

description: A classic Italian dish made with fresh homemade pasta and layers of rich vegetable filling.

name: Mushroom and Truffle Risotto

instructions.title: Prepare the Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice onions and mushrooms, and mince garlic.

instructions.title: Cook the Risotto
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic, add rice, deglaze with wine, and gradually add broth while stirring.

instructions.title: Finish the Risotto
instructions.description: Stir in mushrooms, butter, parmesan, and truffle oil until creamy.

description: An indulgent risotto combining earthy mushrooms and the luxurious aroma of truffle oil.

name: Vegan Mushroom Wellington

instructions.title: Prepare the Mushrooms
instructions.description: Clean and chop mushrooms; sauté with onions and garlic until soft.

instructions.title: Prepare the Spinach
instructions.description: Wilt the spinach in the pan and mix with the mushroom mixture.

instructions.title: Assemble the Wellington
instructions.description: Roll out puff pastry, place filling, and wrap carefully.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Preheat oven to 200°C and bake for 30 minutes until golden brown.

description: A luxurious vegan twist on the classic Wellington, perfect for special occasions.

name: Vegan Biryani

instructions.title: Prepare the Vegetables
instructions.description: Chop and sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and mixed vegetables.

instructions.title: Cook the Rice
instructions.description: Parboil the rice in salted water and set aside.

instructions.title: Layer and Cook
instructions.description: Layer rice and vegetable mixture; add coconut milk and biryani masala.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Cover and cook on low heat until rice is fully cooked.

description: An aromatic and richly spiced vegan biryani that delights the senses.

name: Vegan Ramen

instructions.title: Prepare the Broth
instructions.description: Simmer miso paste, soy sauce, ginger, and garlic in water.

instructions.title: Cook the Noodles
instructions.description: Boil ramen noodles separately and drain.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add mushrooms, tofu, and spinach to the broth; simmer.

instructions.title: Assemble
instructions.description: Serve noodles in bowls, pour broth over, and garnish with spring onions.

description: A savory and comforting vegan ramen that's perfect for a cozy night in.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Skewers

instructions.title: Marinate Chicken
instructions.description: Combine soy sauce, mirin, sugar, ginger, and garlic. Marinate chicken pieces for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Grill Skewers
instructions.description: Thread chicken onto skewers and grill until cooked through, brushing with marinade occasionally.

description: These teriyaki chicken skewers are juicy and flavorful, perfect for a quick weeknight meal or a fun appetizer.

name: Bouillabaisse Marseillaise

instructions.title: Prepare the fish
instructions.description: Clean and cut the sea bass and monkfish into chunks. Set aside.

instructions.title: Cook the vegetables
instructions.description: Sauté leeks and fennel in olive oil until soft, then add garlic and tomatoes.

instructions.title: Add liquids and spices
instructions.description: Pour in fish stock, add saffron, orange zest, bay leaf, and thyme. Simmer for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Add seafood
instructions.description: Add fish and mussels, cook until mussels open and fish is cooked through.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.

description: A traditional Provençal seafood stew infused with saffron and aromatic herbs.

name: Paella de Marisco

instructions.title: Sauté base ingredients
instructions.description: In a large pan, heat olive oil and sauté onion, garlic, and red bell pepper until soft.

instructions.title: Add rice and spices
instructions.description: Stir in rice, saffron, and paprika until rice is well coated.

instructions.title: Incorporate stock
instructions.description: Add fish stock gradually and stir occasionally, allowing the rice to absorb the liquid.

instructions.title: Cook seafood
instructions.description: Add shrimp, calamari, and clams; cook until seafood is done and rice is tender.

instructions.title: Finish and serve
instructions.description: Top with green peas, season with salt and pepper, and garnish with lemon wedges.

description: A rich and flavorful Spanish rice dish loaded with fresh seafood.

name: Cioppino

instructions.title: Prepare the base
instructions.description: Sauté onion, celery, and garlic in olive oil until soft, then add tomato paste.

instructions.title: Add liquids
instructions.description: Pour in white wine and reduce by half, then add crushed tomatoes and fish stock.

instructions.title: Simmer with herbs
instructions.description: Add basil and oregano, simmer for 30 minutes to develop flavors.

instructions.title: Cook seafood
instructions.description: Add crab, clams, shrimp, and cod; cook until clams open and seafood is cooked.

instructions.title: Season and serve
instructions.description: Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve with crusty bread.

description: A hearty and rustic seafood stew with a tomato and wine base, perfect for a cozy meal.

name: Lobster Thermidor

instructions.title: Prepare the lobster
instructions.description: Boil lobsters until cooked, then remove meat and chop. Reserve shells.

instructions.title: Make the sauce
instructions.description: Sauté shallots in butter, deglaze with wine, then add cream and mustard.

instructions.title: Combine ingredients
instructions.description: Stir lobster meat into sauce, season with salt, pepper, and parsley.

instructions.title: Fill and bake
instructions.description: Fill lobster shells with mixture, top with cheese and paprika, then bake until golden.

instructions.title: Serve hot
instructions.description: Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

description: A luxurious French dish featuring lobster in a creamy mustard sauce, baked to perfection.

name: Vegan Stuffed Cabbage Rolls

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: Cook rice and lentils, mix with sautéed onion.

instructions.title: Stuff and Roll
instructions.description: Place filling in cabbage leaves, roll tightly, and secure with toothpicks.

instructions.title: Bake in Sauce
instructions.description: Place rolls in a baking dish, cover with tomato sauce, and bake at 180°C for 60 minutes.

description: A hearty vegan dish featuring tender cabbage leaves stuffed with a savory mixture of rice and lentils, baked in a rich tomato sauce.

name: Lemon Herb Chicken Breasts

instructions.title: Marinate Chicken
instructions.description: Combine lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper. Marinate chicken for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Chicken
instructions.description: Grill or pan-fry chicken breasts until cooked through and golden.

description: Tender and juicy, these lemon herb chicken breasts are bursting with fresh flavors and make a delightful meal.

name: Spicy Beef Tacos

instructions.title: Cook Beef
instructions.description: Brown beef with onion, jalapeno, cumin, and paprika until cooked through.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Fill taco shells with beef mixture, cheese, and sour cream.

description: These spicy beef tacos are packed with flavor and heat, making them a hit for those who love a little spice.

name: Herb-Crusted Pork Chops

instructions.title: Prepare Herb Crust
instructions.description: Mix parsley, thyme, breadcrumbs, salt, and pepper. Coat pork chops in mixture.

instructions.title: Cook Pork Chops
instructions.description: Heat oil in a pan and cook pork chops until golden and cooked through.

description: Delight in the crispy and aromatic flavors of these herb-crusted pork chops, perfect for a satisfying meal.

name: Garlic Butter Steak Bites

instructions.title: Cook Steak
instructions.description: Season steak with salt and pepper. Sear in a pan until browned.

instructions.title: Add Garlic Butter
instructions.description: Melt butter in the pan, add garlic and parsley, and cook until fragrant. Toss steak bites in garlic butter.

description: Juicy and flavorful, these garlic butter steak bites are a quick and delicious way to enjoy steak with a rich buttery sauce.

name: Classic Meatloaf

instructions.title: Prepare Meatloaf Mixture
instructions.description: Combine beef, breadcrumbs, egg, onion, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Shape into a loaf.

instructions.title: Bake Meatloaf
instructions.description: Place loaf in a baking dish, top with ketchup, and bake until cooked through.

description: A comforting classic, this meatloaf is flavorful and easy to prepare, making it a perfect family meal.

name: Vegetarian Quinoa Salad

instructions.title: Cook Quinoa
instructions.description: Rinse quinoa and cook in boiling water for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Chop cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.

instructions.title: Mix Salad
instructions.description: Combine quinoa, vegetables, and feta cheese in a bowl.

instructions.title: Dress Salad
instructions.description: Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice, then season with salt and pepper.

description: A refreshing and nutritious salad packed with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and feta cheese for a delightful meal.

name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera

instructions.title: Cook Pasta
instructions.description: Boil pasta according to package instructions.

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté garlic, broccoli, carrot, zucchini, and bell pepper until tender.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Mix cooked pasta with sautéed vegetables and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper before serving.

description: A colorful and vibrant pasta dish with a mix of fresh vegetables, perfect for a light and satisfying meal.

name: Vegetarian Stir-Fried Tofu

instructions.title: Prepare Tofu
instructions.description: Cut tofu into cubes and marinate in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic for 10 minutes.

instructions.title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pan, heat sesame oil and stir-fry bell pepper and broccoli until tender.

instructions.title: Cook Tofu
instructions.description: Add marinated tofu to the pan and cook until golden.

instructions.title: Garnish
instructions.description: Garnish with chopped spring onions before serving.

description: A quick and flavorful stir-fried tofu dish, combined with vibrant vegetables for a hearty meal.

name: Vegetarian Greek Stuffed Tomatoes

instructions.title: Prepare Tomatoes
instructions.description: Cut the tops off the tomatoes and scoop out the insides.

instructions.title: Cook Filling
instructions.description: Cook rice and mix with crumbled feta, olive oil, chopped onion, and parsley.

instructions.title: Stuff Tomatoes
instructions.description: Fill tomatoes with the rice mixture and place in a baking dish.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 20 minutes.

description: Deliciously baked tomatoes stuffed with a savory mixture of rice, feta, and herbs, capturing the essence of Greek cuisine.

name: Vegetarian French Ratatouille

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté onion and garlic until soft, then add diced vegetables.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Add thyme, salt, and pepper, and cook on low heat for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve warm as a side dish or main course.

description: A traditional French dish made with a medley of sautéed vegetables, perfect for a comforting and flavorful meal.

name: Vegetarian Spinach and Ricotta Pie

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Mix spinach, ricotta, Parmesan, egg, nutmeg, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

instructions.title: Prepare Pastry
instructions.description: Roll out puff pastry and line a pie dish.

instructions.title: Add Filling
instructions.description: Pour spinach mixture into the pie dish and cover with remaining pastry.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes until golden.

description: A delightful Italian pie filled with creamy ricotta and fresh spinach, encased in a flaky puff pastry.

name: Vegetarian Indian Potato and Pea Curry

instructions.title: Cook Potatoes
instructions.description: Boil potatoes until tender, then dice.

instructions.title: Sauté Spices
instructions.description: In a pan, heat oil and sauté cumin seeds, onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add tomatoes, turmeric, coriander, potatoes, and peas, then cook for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Add salt to taste and serve hot with rice or bread.

description: A comforting and spicy Indian curry with tender potatoes and peas, perfect for any meal.

name: Vegetarian Mexican Bean Burrito

instructions.title: Prepare Beans
instructions.description: Rinse and drain black beans.

instructions.title: Assemble Burrito
instructions.description: Place beans, corn, avocado slices, cheddar, salsa, and sour cream on each tortilla.

instructions.title: Wrap
instructions.description: Fold in the sides of the tortilla and roll up tightly.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with cilantro and a squeeze of lime before serving.

description: A quick and satisfying meal with hearty black beans, creamy avocado, and cheese wrapped in a soft tortilla.

name: Vegan Quinoa Salad

instructions.title: Cook Quinoa
instructions.description: Rinse quinoa in cold water and cook according to package instructions.

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Chop cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion into small pieces.

instructions.title: Mix Salad
instructions.description: Combine cooked quinoa, vegetables, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

instructions.title: Garnish
instructions.description: Top with chopped parsley before serving.

description: A fresh and colorful salad packed with protein-rich quinoa and vibrant vegetables, perfect for a light meal.

name: Vegan Sweet Potato Curry

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Peel and dice sweet potatoes, chop onion and mince garlic.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onion and garlic until soft.

instructions.title: Add Sweet Potatoes
instructions.description: Add sweet potatoes and curry powder, stirring to coat.

instructions.title: Simmer Curry
instructions.description: Pour in coconut milk and chickpeas, bring to a simmer and cook until sweet potatoes are tender.

instructions.title: Add Spinach
instructions.description: Stir in spinach and cook until wilted. Season with salt.

description: A creamy and hearty curry featuring sweet potatoes and chickpeas, simmered in a fragrant coconut sauce.

name: Vegan Lentil Soup

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice carrots, celery, and onion. Mince garlic.

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pot, heat olive oil and sauté onion, garlic, carrots, and celery until soft.

instructions.title: Add Lentils
instructions.description: Add lentils, tomato paste, and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.

instructions.title: Simmer Soup
instructions.description: Reduce heat and simmer until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

description: A nourishing lentil soup that's easy to prepare and packed with earthy flavors, perfect for a cozy meal.

name: Vegan Tofu Stir Fry

instructions.title: Prepare Tofu
instructions.description: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cut into cubes and coat with cornstarch.

instructions.title: Cook Tofu
instructions.description: Heat sesame oil in a pan and fry tofu cubes until golden and crisp.

instructions.title: Stir Fry Vegetables
instructions.description: Add chopped bell peppers, broccoli, minced garlic, and ginger to the pan and stir fry.

instructions.title: Add Sauce
instructions.description: Pour in soy sauce and toss everything together. Garnish with sliced spring onions.

description: A vibrant and flavorful stir fry with crispy tofu and fresh vegetables, tossed in a savory soy sauce.

name: Vegan Black Bean Tacos

instructions.title: Prepare Beans
instructions.description: Rinse and drain black beans, then heat with olive oil and chili powder in a pan.

instructions.title: Prepare Toppings
instructions.description: Slice avocado, shred red cabbage, and chop cilantro.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Warm tortillas and fill with beans, avocado, cabbage, and cilantro.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Squeeze lime juice over tacos and season with salt before serving.

description: These vibrant tacos are filled with seasoned black beans, creamy avocado, and fresh toppings for a delicious vegan treat.

name: Vegan Cauliflower Buffalo Wings

instructions.title: Prepare Cauliflower
instructions.description: Cut cauliflower into florets.

instructions.title: Make Batter
instructions.description: Mix flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper, and plant milk to make a batter.

instructions.title: Coat Cauliflower
instructions.description: Dip cauliflower florets into the batter and place on a baking sheet.

instructions.title: Bake and Glaze
instructions.description: Bake in the oven at 200°C for 20 minutes, remove and toss in buffalo sauce, then bake for another 10 minutes.

description: These spicy and crispy cauliflower buffalo wings are a perfect vegan alternative to the classic appetizer.

name: Vegan Mushroom Stroganoff

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: Heat olive oil in a pan, add chopped onion and garlic, and sauté until soft.

instructions.title: Cook Mushrooms
instructions.description: Add sliced mushrooms and cook until browned.

instructions.title: Add Sauce
instructions.description: Stir in vegetable broth, vegan sour cream, and paprika, cooking until thickened.

instructions.title: Season and Serve
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve.

description: A creamy and savory mushroom stroganoff that's both comforting and vegan-friendly, perfect for a quick dinner.

name: Garlic Lemon Shrimp Skewers

instructions.title: Prepare Shrimp
instructions.description: Peel and devein the shrimp, leaving tails on.

instructions.title: Make Marinade
instructions.description: Mix minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, chopped parsley, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Marinate Shrimp
instructions.description: Add shrimp to the marinade and let sit for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Grill
instructions.description: Thread shrimp onto skewers and grill for 3-4 minutes on each side.

description: Juicy shrimp marinated in garlic, lemon, and herbs, grilled to perfection on skewers.

name: Coconut Shrimp with Sweet Chili Sauce

instructions.title: Prepare Coatings
instructions.description: Mix coconut and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Place flour and beaten eggs in separate bowls.

instructions.title: Coat Shrimp
instructions.description: Dip shrimp in flour, then eggs, and finally coat with coconut mixture.

instructions.title: Fry Shrimp
instructions.description: Heat oil in a pan and fry shrimp until golden brown, 2-3 minutes per side.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve with sweet chili sauce for dipping.

description: Crispy coconut-coated shrimp served with a tangy sweet chili sauce for a tropical flair.

name: Spicy Tuna Tartare

instructions.title: Chop Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice tuna and avocado, chop green onions.

instructions.title: Mix Ingredients
instructions.description: In a bowl, combine tuna, soy sauce, sesame oil, sriracha, and lime juice.

instructions.title: Assemble Tartare
instructions.description: Gently fold in avocado and green onions.

instructions.title: Garnish
instructions.description: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve chilled.

description: A refreshing and spicy tuna tartare with creamy avocado, perfect for a light starter.

name: Baked Cod with Tomato Relish

instructions.title: Preheat Oven
instructions.description: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).

instructions.title: Prepare Relish
instructions.description: Halve cherry tomatoes, chop olives and basil, mince garlic.

instructions.title: Season Cod
instructions.description: Place cod in baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Top cod with tomato relish and bake for 20 minutes.

description: Delicate cod fillets baked with a vibrant tomato and olive relish, capturing the essence of Italian cuisine.

name: Lemon Garlic Mussels

instructions.title: Clean Mussels
instructions.description: Scrub and debeard the mussels under cold water.

instructions.title: Prepare Sauce
instructions.description: Melt butter in a pot, add minced garlic, lemon juice, and white wine.

instructions.title: Cook Mussels
instructions.description: Add mussels to the pot, cover, and cook until they open, about 5 minutes.

instructions.title: Garnish
instructions.description: Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.

description: Succulent mussels cooked in a fragrant lemon garlic sauce, perfect for a taste of France.

name: Vegan Peking Seitan Duck

instructions.title: Prepare the Seitan
instructions.description: Marinate seitan in hoisin sauce and bake at 200°C for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Prepare Garnishes
instructions.description: Julienne cucumber and slice scallions.

instructions.title: Assemble and Serve
instructions.description: Slice seitan, serve with pancakes, cucumber, and scallions.

description: A vegan rendition of the classic Peking duck, featuring flavorful seitan served with traditional pancakes and garnishes.

name: Crab Meat Salad with Avocado

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice avocado, chop cilantro and red onion.

instructions.title: Mix Salad
instructions.description: Combine crab meat, avocado, cilantro, red onion, lime juice, and olive oil.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Season with salt and pepper.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve chilled or at room temperature.

description: A refreshing crab salad with creamy avocado and a hint of lime, perfect for a light lunch.

name: Prawn and Mango Salad

instructions.title: Prepare Prawns
instructions.description: Peel and devein prawns, then cook in boiling water for 3 minutes.

instructions.title: Chop Ingredients
instructions.description: Dice mango, slice cucumber, and tear lettuce.

instructions.title: Assemble Salad
instructions.description: Combine prawns, mango, cucumber, lettuce, and mint leaves.

instructions.title: Dress Salad
instructions.description: Drizzle with lime juice and olive oil, season with salt.

description: A vibrant prawn salad with juicy mango and fresh mint, bringing the taste of Thailand to your table.

name: Fish Tacos with Cabbage Slaw

instructions.title: Prepare Fish
instructions.description: Season fish with salt and grill for 5 minutes per side.

instructions.title: Make Slaw
instructions.description: Shred cabbage and carrot, mix with lime juice and chopped cilantro.

instructions.title: Assemble Tacos
instructions.description: Place fish in taco shells, top with cabbage slaw and sour cream.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve with lime wedges on the side.

description: Light and crispy fish tacos topped with a crunchy cabbage slaw, perfect for a quick and tasty meal.

name: Tuscan Chicken Stew

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop garlic and rosemary. Drain and rinse the beans.

instructions.title: Sear Chicken
instructions.description: Heat oil in a pot and sear the chicken until golden.

instructions.title: Cook Stew
instructions.description: Add garlic, rosemary, tomato paste, beans, and broth. Simmer for 60 minutes.

description: A hearty Tuscan stew featuring tender chicken thighs and creamy cannellini beans, perfect for a cozy dinner.

name: Moroccan Spiced Beef Tagine

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop onion and cut beef into chunks.

instructions.title: Brown Beef
instructions.description: Heat oil in a tagine and brown the beef.

instructions.title: Cook Tagine
instructions.description: Add onion, apricots, cinnamon, cumin, and stock. Simmer for 70 minutes.

description: Richly spiced beef tagine with sweet apricots, offering a taste of Morocco right at your table.

name: Japanese Chicken Katsu Curry

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice vegetables and prepare curry roux.

instructions.title: Cook Curry
instructions.description: Simmer vegetables in water with curry roux for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Fry Chicken
instructions.description: Coat chicken in egg and breadcrumbs, then fry until golden.

description: A delightful Japanese dish featuring crispy chicken katsu served with a rich and savory curry sauce.

name: Argentinian Beef Empanadas

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Cook beef, onion, and spices until done. Mix in boiled eggs and olives.

instructions.title: Fill Empanadas
instructions.description: Place filling in dough discs and fold to seal.

instructions.title: Bake Empanadas
instructions.description: Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes until golden.

description: Golden, flaky empanadas filled with savory beef and spices, a staple of Argentinian cuisine.

name: Korean BBQ Beef Bulgogi

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, and sugar.

instructions.title: Marinate Beef
instructions.description: Slice beef thinly and marinate for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Grill Beef
instructions.description: Grill beef on high heat for 5-7 minutes until cooked.

description: Sweet and savory slices of marinated beef, grilled to perfection, embodying the essence of Korean BBQ.

name: Spanish Chorizo and Chicken Paella

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice bell pepper and chorizo. Cut chicken into pieces.

instructions.title: Cook Paella Base
instructions.description: Sauté chorizo and chicken, add rice and saffron.

instructions.title: Simmer Paella
instructions.description: Add broth and simmer for 30 minutes until rice is cooked.

description: A vibrant and aromatic paella with succulent chicken, spicy chorizo, and fragrant saffron rice.

name: Indian Butter Chicken

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix ginger, garlic, and spices. Coat chicken and marinate for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Chicken
instructions.description: Sauté chicken in butter until cooked.

instructions.title: Make Sauce
instructions.description: Add tomato puree and cream, simmer for 20 minutes.

description: A classic Indian dish with tender chicken pieces enveloped in a creamy, buttery, and spiced sauce.

name: French Coq au Vin

instructions.title: Marinate Chicken
instructions.description: Marinate chicken in wine and thyme overnight.

instructions.title: Cook Bacon and Vegetables
instructions.description: Sauté bacon, onions, and mushrooms.

instructions.title: Simmer Coq au Vin
instructions.description: Add chicken and marinade, simmer for 60 minutes.

description: A traditional French dish, where chicken is slow-cooked in red wine with mushrooms and bacon.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Shells

instructions.title: Prep Ingredients
instructions.description: Preheat oven to 180°C. Cook pasta shells according to package instructions.

instructions.title: Cook Spinach
instructions.description: In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté garlic until fragrant. Add spinach and cook until wilted.

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: In a bowl, mix cooked spinach, feta, ricotta, and half of the parmesan.

instructions.title: Stuff Shells
instructions.description: Fill each shell with the spinach mixture and place in a baking dish.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Pour tomato sauce over shells, sprinkle with remaining parmesan, and bake for 25 minutes.

description: A comforting dish of pasta shells stuffed with a creamy spinach and feta filling, baked in a rich tomato sauce.

name: Vegetable Moussaka

instructions.title: Slice Vegetables
instructions.description: Cut eggplants, zucchini, and potatoes into thin slices.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pan, fry vegetables in olive oil until golden brown, then set aside.

instructions.title: Prepare Sauce
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic, add tomato paste, cinnamon, and simmer.

instructions.title: Layer Moussaka
instructions.description: Layer potatoes, zucchini, eggplants, and sauce in a baking dish. Top with béchamel sauce.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes until golden on top.

description: A classic Greek dish, this vegetarian moussaka is rich with layers of eggplant, zucchini, and potatoes, topped with creamy béchamel.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala

instructions.title: Marinate Paneer
instructions.description: Mix yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, cumin, and salt. Coat paneer chunks and marinate for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Paneer
instructions.description: Grill or pan-fry the marinated paneer until golden.

instructions.title: Prepare Sauce
instructions.description: In a pan, sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden. Add tomato puree and cook until thickened.

instructions.title: Combine and Simmer
instructions.description: Add grilled paneer to the sauce, pour in cream, and simmer for 10 minutes.

description: A favorite North Indian dish made from grilled paneer cubes simmered in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Vegetarian Jambalaya

instructions.title: Prep Vegetables
instructions.description: Chop bell peppers, celery, onion, and garlic.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a large pot, sauté vegetables in olive oil until softened.

instructions.title: Add Rice and Seasoning
instructions.description: Stir in rice and Cajun seasoning, cook for 1 minute.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Add canned tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes until rice is cooked.

description: A vibrant and spicy vegetarian version of the classic jambalaya, packed with colorful vegetables and Cajun flavors.

name: Broccoli and Cheese Quiche

instructions.title: Prepare Crust
instructions.description: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a pie dish with pastry and bake for 10 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Broccoli
instructions.description: Steam broccoli until tender, then chop.

instructions.title: Make Filling
instructions.description: Beat eggs with milk, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. Stir in cheese and broccoli.

instructions.title: Bake Quiche
instructions.description: Pour filling into crust and bake for 35 minutes until set.

description: A delicious and hearty quiche with a creamy filling of broccoli and cheddar cheese, perfect for brunch or a light dinner.

name: Eggplant Parmesan

instructions.title: Prep Eggplants
instructions.description: Slice eggplants, sprinkle with salt, and let sit for 30 minutes. Rinse and pat dry.

instructions.title: Bread Eggplants
instructions.description: Dip eggplant slices in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan.

instructions.title: Fry Eggplants
instructions.description: Fry breaded eggplants in olive oil until golden brown.

instructions.title: Assemble and Bake
instructions.description: Layer eggplants, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil in a baking dish. Repeat layers and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

description: A classic Italian dish featuring layers of breaded eggplant slices, rich tomato sauce, and melted cheese.

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats

instructions.title: Prepare Zucchini
instructions.description: Halve zucchinis lengthwise and scoop out the seeds.

instructions.title: Cook Quinoa
instructions.description: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and set aside.

instructions.title: Make Filling
instructions.description: Mix cooked quinoa, chickpeas, diced tomatoes, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, and parsley.

instructions.title: Stuff and Bake
instructions.description: Fill zucchini halves with the mixture and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

description: These zucchini boats are filled with a flavorful mixture of quinoa, chickpeas, and feta, making a light yet satisfying dish.

name: Sweet Potato and Black Bean Enchiladas

instructions.title: Cook Sweet Potatoes
instructions.description: Peel and dice sweet potatoes, cook until tender.

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Mix cooked sweet potatoes, black beans, diced onion, cumin, and chili powder.

instructions.title: Assemble Enchiladas
instructions.description: Fill tortillas with the mixture, roll, and place in a baking dish.

instructions.title: Top and Bake
instructions.description: Pour enchilada sauce over the rolls, sprinkle with cheese, and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

description: These enchiladas are a hearty vegetarian delight, filled with sweet potatoes and black beans, perfect for a flavorful meal.

name: Vegan Ratatouille

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes. Chop onion and garlic.

instructions.title: Cook Onion and Garlic
instructions.description: In a large pan, heat olive oil and sauté onion and garlic until translucent.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper to the pan. Cook for 10 minutes.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Add tomatoes and herbs. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve warm, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

description: A classic French vegetable medley that’s both hearty and healthy. Perfect for a cozy meal.

name: Vegan Shepherd's Pie

instructions.title: Cook Lentils
instructions.description: Cook lentils according to package instructions.

instructions.title: Make Mashed Potatoes
instructions.description: Boil potatoes until tender, mash with olive oil, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Sauté onion, garlic, carrots in olive oil. Add lentils, peas, broth, soy sauce, thyme.

instructions.title: Assemble Pie
instructions.description: Place the filling in a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30 minutes until golden on top.

description: A comforting vegan version of the traditional shepherd’s pie, packed with flavor and nutrients.

name: Vegan Moroccan Tagine

instructions.title: Prepare Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice sweet potatoes, carrots, and zucchini. Chop onion and tomatoes.

instructions.title: Cook Onions
instructions.description: In a large pot, heat olive oil and cook onions until soft.

instructions.title: Add Spices
instructions.description: Add cumin, cinnamon, coriander and cook for 1 minute.

instructions.title: Simmer Tagine
instructions.description: Add vegetables, chickpeas, tomatoes, raisins, and broth. Simmer for 45 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve hot with couscous or flatbread.

description: A fragrant and flavorful Moroccan stew packed with vegetables and spices, perfect for a vegan feast.

name: Vegan Pad Thai

instructions.title: Cook Noodles
instructions.description: Boil rice noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.

instructions.title: Prepare Tofu and Vegetables
instructions.description: Cut tofu into cubes, julienne carrot, chop green onions and garlic.

instructions.title: Make Sauce
instructions.description: Mix peanut butter, soy sauce, lime juice, and a bit of water in a bowl.

instructions.title: Stir-Fry
instructions.description: In a wok, heat oil and stir-fry garlic, tofu, and vegetables. Add noodles and sauce.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Top with peanuts and chili flakes. Serve immediately.

description: A vibrant and flavorful vegan pad Thai that's perfect for a quick meal full of taste and texture.

name: Vegan Jambalaya

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: Dice bell peppers, celery, onion, and tomatoes. Sauté with garlic in olive oil.

instructions.title: Add Rice and Spices
instructions.description: Add rice, Cajun spice, and thyme. Stir to coat rice in spices.

instructions.title: Add Broth and Simmer
instructions.description: Pour in vegetable broth, bring to a boil then reduce to a simmer for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Add Beans
instructions.description: Stir in kidney beans and cook for another 10 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

description: A flavorful and spicy vegan jambalaya that brings the taste of New Orleans to your kitchen.

name: Vegan Moussaka

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice eggplant and potatoes. Chop onion, garlic, and tomatoes.

instructions.title: Cook Lentils
instructions.description: Boil lentils until tender. Drain and set aside.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pan, sauté onion and garlic. Add tomatoes, lentils, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

instructions.title: Layer Moussaka
instructions.description: Layer eggplant, potatoes, and lentil mixture in a baking dish.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 40 minutes until the top is golden.

description: A hearty vegan moussaka with layers of eggplant, potatoes, and lentils, all baked to perfection.

name: Vegan Quinoa Stuffed Peppers

instructions.title: Cook Quinoa
instructions.description: Rinse quinoa and cook according to package instructions.

instructions.title: Prepare Filling
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes, beans, corn, quinoa, and spices.

instructions.title: Stuff Peppers
instructions.description: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds. Stuff with quinoa mixture.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Place peppers in a baking dish, cover with foil, and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs.

description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a spicy quinoa and black bean mixture, perfect for a vegan meal.

name: Cajun Shrimp Jambalaya

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop the vegetables and slice the sausage.

instructions.title: Cook Sausage
instructions.description: In a large pot, cook the sausage until browned.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Sauté the onion, bell pepper, and celery until soft.

instructions.title: Add Rice and Broth
instructions.description: Stir in the rice, Cajun seasoning, and broth. Bring to a boil.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Reduce heat and simmer until rice is tender.

instructions.title: Add Shrimp
instructions.description: Stir in the shrimp and cook until pink and opaque.

description: A hearty and flavorful dish packed with shrimp, sausage, and seasoned rice. Perfect for a taste of the South!

name: Mediterranean Seafood Stew

instructions.title: Sauté Aromatics
instructions.description: Cook onions, garlic, and fennel in olive oil until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomato Paste
instructions.description: Stir in tomato paste and cook for a few minutes.

instructions.title: Deglaze
instructions.description: Add white wine and scrape up any browned bits.

instructions.title: Add Stock
instructions.description: Pour in fish stock and bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Cook Seafood
instructions.description: Add mixed seafood to the stew and cook until just done.

description: A rich and aromatic stew with a variety of seafood simmered in a flavorful broth. Perfectly warming and satisfying.

name: Thai Spicy Basil Shrimp

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Mince garlic and chop chilies.

instructions.title: Cook Garlic and Chili
instructions.description: Sauté garlic and chili in oil until fragrant.

instructions.title: Add Shrimp
instructions.description: Add shrimp and stir-fry until just cooked.

instructions.title: Season
instructions.description: Add fish sauce, soy sauce, and sugar. Stir well.

instructions.title: Add Basil
instructions.description: Toss in basil leaves and cook until wilted.

description: A quick and spicy dish with succulent shrimp and aromatic Thai basil. Packs a punch of flavor in every bite.

name: Italian Seafood Risotto

instructions.title: Cook Onion and Garlic
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.

instructions.title: Toast Rice
instructions.description: Add rice and cook until translucent.

instructions.title: Add Wine
instructions.description: Pour in wine and stir until absorbed.

instructions.title: Add Stock
instructions.description: Gradually add stock, stirring until absorbed each time.

instructions.title: Cook Seafood
instructions.description: Add seafood and cook until opaque.

instructions.title: Finish with Cheese
instructions.description: Stir in Parmesan cheese until creamy.

description: A creamy and luxurious risotto loaded with fresh seafood and enriched with Parmesan. A true taste of the Italian coast.

name: Indian Spiced Fish Curry

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop onion and tomatoes, mince garlic and ginger.

instructions.title: Cook Aromatics
instructions.description: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger until golden.

instructions.title: Add Spices
instructions.description: Stir in turmeric and coriander powder.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes
instructions.description: Cook tomatoes until soft.

instructions.title: Add Fish and Coconut Milk
instructions.description: Add fish and coconut milk, simmer until fish is cooked.

description: Delicately spiced curry with tender fish fillets and creamy coconut milk. A comforting dish with a hint of spice.

name: French Bouillabaisse

instructions.title: Prepare Base
instructions.description: Sauté fennel, leeks, and garlic until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes
instructions.description: Add chopped tomatoes and saffron, cook until tomatoes break down.

instructions.title: Add Stock
instructions.description: Pour in fish stock and bring to a boil.

instructions.title: Add Seafood
instructions.description: Add fish and shellfish, simmer until cooked.

description: A classic French seafood stew with a rich broth filled with a variety of fish and shellfish. A feast for the senses.

name: Spanish Gambas al Ajillo

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Slice garlic and chop parsley.

instructions.title: Heat Oil
instructions.description: Warm olive oil in a pan, add garlic until golden.

instructions.title: Cook Shrimp
instructions.description: Add shrimp and paprika, cook until pink.

instructions.title: Finish
instructions.description: Sprinkle with parsley and lemon juice before serving.

description: A simple yet flavorful Spanish tapas dish with shrimp sautéed in garlic-infused olive oil, enhanced with a touch of paprika.

name: Portuguese Bacalhau à Brás

instructions.title: Prepare Cod
instructions.description: Soak cod in water for 24 hours, changing water regularly.

instructions.title: Fry Potatoes
instructions.description: Cut potatoes into matchsticks and fry until golden.

instructions.title: Sauté Onion
instructions.description: Cook onions in olive oil until soft.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Add cod and potatoes to onions, stir well.

instructions.title: Add Eggs
instructions.description: Stir in beaten eggs until just set.

instructions.title: Garnish
instructions.description: Top with parsley and olives before serving.

description: A traditional Portuguese dish combining salted cod, potatoes, and eggs, garnished with parsley and olives for a savory delight.

name: Beef Bourguignon

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Chop the beef into cubes and slice the vegetables.

instructions.title: Marinate
instructions.description: Combine beef, wine, and herbs in a bowl and marinate overnight.

instructions.title: Sear Beef
instructions.description: Brown the beef in a large pot.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: Sauté onions, carrots, and mushrooms.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Add beef, marinade, and broth back into the pot and simmer for 3 hours.

description: A traditional French stew that combines tender beef, rich wine sauce, and hearty vegetables for a truly comforting dish.

name: Korean BBQ Short Ribs

instructions.title: Prepare Marinade
instructions.description: Mix soy sauce, sugar, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil.

instructions.title: Marinate Ribs
instructions.description: Coat ribs with marinade and let sit for at least 4 hours.

instructions.title: Grill
instructions.description: Grill ribs over medium heat until tender.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with sliced green onions and serve hot.

description: Tender, flavorful ribs marinated in a savory-sweet mixture and grilled to perfection, a staple in Korean BBQ.

name: Argentinian Asado

instructions.title: Prepare Grill
instructions.description: Heat your grill to a medium-high temperature.

instructions.title: Season Meat
instructions.description: Season the beef ribs and sausages with sea salt.

instructions.title: Grill Meat
instructions.description: Grill beef ribs and sausages slowly, turning occasionally.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve hot with chimichurri sauce.

description: A traditional Argentinian barbecue featuring succulent beef ribs and flavorful chorizo, perfect for a festive gathering.

name: Portuguese Cozido

instructions.title: Boil Meats
instructions.description: Boil beef brisket, pork ribs, and chorizo in a large pot.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add cabbage, potatoes, and carrots to the pot and cook until tender.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve piping hot, arranging meat and vegetables on a large platter.

description: A hearty and comforting stew featuring a variety of meats and vegetables, perfect for a cold day.

name: Indian Lamb Biryani

instructions.title: Marinate Lamb
instructions.description: Marinate lamb with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and biryani masala for 2 hours.

instructions.title: Cook Rice
instructions.description: Cook basmati rice until 70% done.

instructions.title: Layer Biryani
instructions.description: Layer rice and lamb in a pot with saffron and mint leaves.

instructions.title: Cook
instructions.description: Cook on low heat until the lamb is tender and rice is fully cooked.

description: A fragrant and flavorful dish of spiced lamb and rice, layered and cooked to perfection, creating a harmony of delicious aromas.

name: Hungarian Goulash

instructions.title: Sauté Onions
instructions.description: Cook onions in a large pot until translucent.

instructions.title: Add Beef
instructions.description: Add beef to the pot and brown on all sides.

instructions.title: Add Spices
instructions.description: Stir in paprika and garlic.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Add broth, potatoes, and carrots and let simmer until tender.

description: A classic Hungarian stew of tender beef and hearty vegetables, seasoned with sweet paprika for a rich, robust flavor.

name: Brazilian Feijoada

instructions.title: Soak Beans
instructions.description: Soak black beans overnight.

instructions.title: Cook Meat
instructions.description: Brown pork shoulder, chorizo, and bacon in a large pot.

instructions.title: Add Beans
instructions.description: Add beans and water to the pot, along with onions, garlic, and bay leaves.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Simmer on low heat until beans are tender and flavors meld.

description: A rich and hearty black bean and meat stew, embodying the flavors of Brazil and perfect for a fulfilling meal.

name: Japanese Sukiyaki

instructions.title: Prepare Sauce
instructions.description: Mix soy sauce, mirin, and sugar to make the sukiyaki sauce.

instructions.title: Cook Beef
instructions.description: Sear the beef in a hot pot.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables
instructions.description: Add mushrooms, tofu, cabbage, and green onions to the pot.

instructions.title: Simmer
instructions.description: Pour sauce over ingredients and simmer until cooked through.

description: A traditional Japanese hot pot dish with a sweet-savory broth, featuring tender beef and fresh vegetables.

name: Eggplant and Ricotta Ravioli

instructions.title: Prepare the Dough
instructions.description: Mix flour and eggs to make a smooth dough. Rest for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Roast Eggplant
instructions.description: Slice eggplant, coat with olive oil, and roast until tender.

instructions.title: Make Filling
instructions.description: Mash roasted eggplant with ricotta, parmesan, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Assemble Ravioli
instructions.description: Roll out dough, cut into squares, fill with eggplant mixture, and seal.

instructions.title: Cook Ravioli
instructions.description: Boil ravioli in salted water until they float to the surface.

description: Handmade ravioli stuffed with a creamy eggplant and ricotta filling, served with a touch of olive oil and fresh basil.

name: Vegetarian Ramen with Homemade Noodles

instructions.title: Make Noodles
instructions.description: Combine flour, water, and salt to form a dough, roll thin, and cut into noodles.

instructions.title: Prepare Broth
instructions.description: Simmer vegetable broth with soy sauce and miso paste for flavor.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: Sauté mushrooms and bok choy until tender.

instructions.title: Assemble Ramen
instructions.description: Cook noodles, add to broth with vegetables, garnish with eggs and green onions.

description: A rich and flavorful vegetarian ramen served with homemade noodles and topped with fresh vegetables and a soft-boiled egg.

name: Wild Mushroom and Spinach Strudel

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: Cook onions, garlic, and mushrooms in butter until soft. Add spinach, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Prepare Phyllo
instructions.description: Layer phyllo sheets, brushing each with butter.

instructions.title: Assemble Strudel
instructions.description: Spread mushroom mixture on phyllo, roll tightly, and seal edges.

instructions.title: Bake Strudel
instructions.description: Brush with egg yolk and bake until golden brown.

description: A delicate strudel filled with a savory blend of wild mushrooms and spinach, encased in crisp phyllo pastry.

name: Stuffed Artichokes with Lemon and Herbs

instructions.title: Prepare Artichokes
instructions.description: Trim artichokes and remove chokes, leaving space for stuffing.

instructions.title: Make Stuffing
instructions.description: Combine breadcrumbs, parmesan, minced garlic, chopped parsley, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Stuff Artichokes
instructions.description: Fill artichokes with breadcrumb mixture and drizzle with olive oil.

instructions.title: Steam Artichokes
instructions.description: Place in a pot with water and steam until tender.
