description: Tender artichokes stuffed with a zesty mixture of breadcrumbs, parmesan, and herbs, steamed to perfection.

name: Pistachio and Goat Cheese Terrine

instructions.title: Prepare Cheese Mixture
instructions.description: Combine goat cheese, cream cheese, honey, salt, and pepper until smooth.

instructions.title: Layer Terrine
instructions.description: In a mold, alternate layers of cheese mixture, chopped pistachios, and cranberries.

instructions.title: Chill Terrine
instructions.description: Refrigerate until firm, about 2 hours.

instructions.title: Serve Terrine
instructions.description: Unmold and serve with crackers.

description: A rich and creamy terrine combining tangy goat cheese with crunchy pistachios and sweet cranberries, perfect for a gourmet appetizer.

name: Roasted Butternut Squash and Sage Risotto

instructions.title: Roast Squash
instructions.description: Cut squash into cubes, toss with olive oil, and roast until tender.

instructions.title: Prepare Risotto
instructions.description: Sauté onion and garlic in butter, add rice and wine, stirring until absorbed.

instructions.title: Cook Risotto
instructions.description: Gradually add broth, stirring constantly, until rice is al dente.

instructions.title: Finish Risotto
instructions.description: Stir in roasted squash, parmesan, and sage, season to taste.

description: A creamy risotto infused with the flavors of roasted butternut squash and aromatic sage, topped with parmesan cheese.

name: Beetroot and Feta Galette

instructions.title: Prepare Dough
instructions.description: Mix flour, butter, and salt, incorporate egg yolk, and chill dough in fridge.

instructions.title: Roast Beetroot
instructions.description: Wrap beetroots in foil, roast until tender, then slice.

instructions.title: Assemble Galette
instructions.description: Roll out dough, layer with beetroot, feta, dill, lemon zest, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Bake Galette
instructions.description: Fold edges of dough over filling, bake until golden.

description: A rustic galette featuring sweet roasted beetroots and creamy feta cheese, accented with fresh dill and lemon zest.

name: Caramelized Onion and Gruyère Soufflé

instructions.title: Caramelize Onions
instructions.description: Slice onions thinly, cook in butter until deep golden brown.

instructions.title: Prepare Béchamel
instructions.description: Melt butter, stir in flour, gradually whisk in milk, season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Mix Soufflé Base
instructions.description: Combine béchamel with egg yolks, grated Gruyère, and caramelized onions.

instructions.title: Fold in Egg Whites
instructions.description: Beat egg whites to stiff peaks, fold into soufflé base gently.

instructions.title: Bake Soufflé
instructions.description: Pour into a greased soufflé dish and bake until risen and golden.

description: A light and airy soufflé with the rich flavor of caramelized onions and melted Gruyère cheese, perfect for a sophisticated dinner.

name: Vegan Baked Alaska

instructions.title: Prepare the Meringue
instructions.description: Whip aquafaba until soft peaks form, gradually adding sugar to create stiff peaks.

instructions.title: Assemble and Freeze
instructions.description: Place vegan ice cream on sponge cake, cover with meringue, and freeze until firm.

instructions.title: Bake and Serve
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 5 minutes or until meringue is golden, then serve immediately.

description: A stunning vegan twist on a classic dessert, combining soft meringue with creamy ice cream atop a fluffy sponge cake.

name: Vegan Tofu Wellington

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: Sauté mushrooms, onion, and spinach until softened, and set aside.

instructions.title: Assemble the Wellington
instructions.description: Wrap tofu with the mushroom mixture in puff pastry.

instructions.title: Bake
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

description: A plant-based take on the traditional Wellington, featuring savory tofu and mushrooms wrapped in crisp, flaky pastry.

name: Vegan Jackfruit Tarte Tatin

instructions.title: Caramelize the Sugar
instructions.description: Melt sugar with vegan butter in a skillet until caramelized.

instructions.title: Prepare the Tarte
instructions.description: Arrange jackfruit in caramel, cover with puff pastry, and bake.

instructions.title: Bake and Invert
instructions.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 25 minutes, then invert onto a plate.

description: A delightful vegan dessert, featuring sweet and succulent jackfruit atop a caramel base, encased in a crisp pastry.

name: Vegan Tempeh Bourguignon

instructions.title: Marinate Tempeh
instructions.description: Marinate tempeh in red wine with garlic overnight.

instructions.title: Cook the Stew
instructions.description: Sauté onions and carrots, add tempeh and wine, simmer for 90 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve the bourguignon hot with a side of crusty bread.

description: A rich and hearty vegan version of the classic French stew, bursting with the deep flavors of red wine and savory tempeh.

name: Vegan Moroccan Bastilla

instructions.title: Prepare the Filling
instructions.description: Cook onions, chickpeas, and almonds with cinnamon until well combined.

instructions.title: Layer the Bastilla
instructions.description: Layer phyllo with chickpea mixture in a circular pan.

instructions.title: Bake and Serve
instructions.description: Bake at 190°C for 40 minutes until golden, then slice and serve.

description: A savory-sweet Moroccan pie with a crispy phyllo crust, filled with aromatic chickpeas and almonds.

name: Vegan Szechuan Mapo Tofu

instructions.title: Prepare the Sauce
instructions.description: Fry garlic and peppercorns, add chili paste and broth.

instructions.title: Add Tofu
instructions.description: Cube tofu and gently simmer in the sauce for 15 minutes.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Serve hot with steamed rice.

description: A spicy and aromatic vegan dish featuring silky tofu in a vibrant Szechuan sauce, perfect for spice lovers.

name: Saffron Lobster Risotto

instructions.title: Prepare Lobster
instructions.description: Boil lobster tails until cooked, remove meat and set aside.

instructions.title: Sauté Onion
instructions.description: In a pan, heat olive oil and butter, sauté onions until translucent.

instructions.title: Cook Rice
instructions.description: Add rice and saffron, stir for 2 minutes, then add wine and simmer until absorbed.

instructions.title: Add Stock
instructions.description: Gradually add stock, stirring constantly until rice is creamy and cooked through.

instructions.title: Finish and Serve
instructions.description: Stir in Parmesan and lobster meat, garnish with parsley, and serve hot.

description: An exquisite saffron-infused risotto paired with succulent lobster, perfect for a gourmet dining experience.

name: Bouillabaisse

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Clean and prepare all seafood, set aside.

instructions.title: Sauté Vegetables
instructions.description: In a large pot, heat olive oil, add fennel and garlic, sauté until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes
instructions.description: Add tomatoes and cook until they soften and release juices.

instructions.title: Simmer with Stock
instructions.description: Add fish stock, saffron, and orange peel, simmer for 30 minutes.

instructions.title: Cook Seafood
instructions.description: Add fish, mussels, and prawns, cook until seafood is just done.

description: A classic Provençal seafood stew rich with flavors of the Mediterranean, perfect for seafood lovers.

name: Seafood Moqueca

instructions.title: Marinate Fish
instructions.description: Marinate fish and shrimp with lime juice, salt, and pepper.

instructions.title: Cook Vegetables
instructions.description: In a pot, heat palm oil, sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes
instructions.description: Add tomatoes and cook until they break down.

instructions.title: Simmer with Coconut Milk
instructions.description: Pour in coconut milk, bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Cook Seafood
instructions.description: Add fish and shrimp, cook until done, garnish with cilantro.

description: A vibrant and aromatic Brazilian seafood stew, enriched with coconut milk and a touch of lime.

name: Chilean Seafood Empanadas

instructions.title: Prepare Dough
instructions.description: Mix flour, butter, and milk to form dough, let it rest.

instructions.title: Cook Filling
instructions.description: Sauté onion in olive oil, add prawns, scallops, paprika, and parsley, cook until done.

instructions.title: Shape Empanadas
instructions.description: Roll out dough, cut circles, place filling in center, fold and seal edges.

instructions.title: Bake Empanadas
instructions.description: Brush with beaten egg, bake at 180°C for 25 minutes or until golden.

description: Crispy and golden empanadas filled with a savory mix of prawns and scallops, perfect for seafood enthusiasts.

name: Japanese Seafood Hot Pot

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Clean clams, cut salmon into chunks, slice vegetables and tofu.

instructions.title: Simmer Broth
instructions.description: In a pot, combine dashi, soy sauce, mirin, and ginger, bring to a simmer.

instructions.title: Add Seafood
instructions.description: Add clams and salmon, cook until seafood is just done.

instructions.title: Add Vegetables and Tofu
instructions.description: Add cabbage, mushrooms, and tofu, simmer until tender.

instructions.title: Serve Hot Pot
instructions.description: Garnish with spring onions, serve immediately.

description: A comforting Japanese hot pot featuring a mix of seafood and vegetables, perfect for a cozy meal.

name: Vietnamese Grilled Seafood Platter

instructions.title: Marinate Seafood
instructions.description: Mix fish sauce, lemongrass, garlic, sugar, lime, and chili, marinate prawns and squid.

instructions.title: Prepare Grill
instructions.description: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.

instructions.title: Grill Seafood
instructions.description: Grill prawns and squid until charred and cooked through.

instructions.title: Cook Noodles
instructions.description: Boil rice noodles according to package instructions, drain and set aside.

instructions.title: Assemble Platter
instructions.description: Arrange grilled seafood and noodles on a platter, garnish with coriander.

description: A vibrant platter of grilled seafood marinated in aromatic herbs and spices, served with rice noodles.

name: Indian Spiced Seafood Biryani

instructions.title: Cook Rice
instructions.description: Boil rice until half cooked, drain and set aside.

instructions.title: Prepare Seafood
instructions.description: Marinate seafood with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and biryani masala.

instructions.title: Fry Onions
instructions.description: In a pan, heat ghee, fry onions until golden, remove half for garnishing.

instructions.title: Layer Biryani
instructions.description: Layer rice and seafood in a pot, add saffron soaked in milk, cover and cook on low heat.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with fried onions and mint, serve hot.

description: A fragrant and flavorful seafood biryani infused with Indian spices, perfect for a hearty meal.

name: Spanish Zarzuela de Mariscos

instructions.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions.description: Clean seafood, chop vegetables.

instructions.title: Cook Base
instructions.description: In a pan, heat olive oil, sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper until soft.

instructions.title: Add Tomatoes and Wine
instructions.description: Add tomatoes and wine, simmer until sauce thickens.

instructions.title: Add Seafood
instructions.description: Add monkfish, mussels, and prawns, cook until seafood is done.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Garnish with parsley, serve with crusty bread.

description: A rich and aromatic seafood stew from Spain, bursting with the flavors of the sea.
